data.title: AL-ĪQĀẒ (الإيقاظ)
data.text:
Advisory Board

National:

1. Prof. Dr. Mohi-ud-Din Hashmi

Dean Faculty of Arabic & Islamic Studies, AIOU, Islamabad

2. Prof. Dr. Attaullah

Dean Faculty of Shariah and Law, IIU, Islamabad

3. Prof. Dr. Navid Jamil Malik

Dean Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences, University of Sialkot, Sialkot

4. Prof. Dr. Hafiz Muhammad Shahbaz

Chairman Islamic Studies, University of Engineering and Technology, Lahore

5. Prof. Dr. Fazlur Rehman

Chairman Department of Education, Allama Iqbal Open University Islamabad.

6. Prof. Dr. Farhat Nisar

Head Department of Humanities, COMSATS University, Islamabad

7. Prof. Dr. Hamada

Incharge Department of History and Pakistan Studies, SBBWU Peshawar

8. Dr. Samza Fatima

Principal Gillani Law College, Bahauddin Zakariya University, Multan

9. Dr. Faiz Sultan

(PhD English Literature), Principal, Islamabad Model College for Boys Humak, (FA) Islamabad

10. Dr. Ayesha Ashfaq

Chairperson, Deptt of Development Communication Studies, University of the Punjab, Lahore.

11. Dr. Syeda Sadia

Chairperson, Deptt of Islamic & Arabic and Seerat Studies, GC Women University, Sialkot.

12. Dr. Zia ur Rehman

Chairman, Department of Qur'ānic Studies, The Islamia University of Bahawalpur.

13. Prof. Dr. Naqeeb Ahmad Jan

Head Department of Urdu, Women University Swabi, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.

14. Prof. Dr. Musaarat Jamal

Chairperson, Department of Arabic, University of Peshawar.

15. Dr. Syed Abdul Ghaffar Bukhari

Dept. of Islamic Studies, Ex-Editor Al-Basirah, NUML, Islamabad.

16. Prof. Dr. Mansoor Ahmad Qureshi

Head of the Urdu Department, Institute of Southern Punjab

17. Dr. Azra Parveen

Department of Arabic, Bahauddin Zakariya University Multan.

18. Dr. Syed Bacha Agha

Deptt of Islamic Studies, Government Postgraduate College for Boys Saryab road, Quetta.

Advisory Board

International:

1. Prof. Dr. Mohammad Abdul Rahman Younes

Dean of Arabic, Averroes University, Holland

2. Prof. Dr. Abdul Rahman Raddadi

Faculty of Sharia, the Islamic University of Madinah, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

3. Prof. Dr. Fuad Abdul Muttaleb

Department of English, Faculty of Arts, Jerash, University, Jerash, Jordan

4. Prof. Dr. Wael Ali Syed

Faculty of Education, Ain E Shams University, Cairo, Egypt.

5. Prof. Dr. Kamil Seger Azeez

Department of Da`wah and Oratory, Anbar, Imam A’Adhum, University College, Iraq

6. Prof. Dr. Wael Hallaq

Columbia University New York City, 515 Knox Hall, United States of America.

7. Prof. Dr. Mohammad Iqbal Ahmed Farahat

Department of Faith & Da`wah, Qatar University, Qatar

8. Prof. Dr. Khadeeja Zabar

Faculty of Education, Arabic Department, Bagdad University, Bagdad, Iraq.

9. Prof. Dr. Rizwanur Rahman

Centre of Arabic and African Studies, Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), India

10. Prof. Dr. Md. Manirozzaman

Department of Arabic, University of Rajshahi, Bangladesh

11. Dr. Aurang Zeb Azmi

Faculty of Humanities and Languages, Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi, India

12. Dr. Aamir Khalel Ahmed Aljarrah

Faculty of Islamic Studies, Fatih Sultan Mehmet University, Istanbul, Turkey
